MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Rest.Azure.IPage<Microsoft.Azure.Management.EventGrid.Models.SystemTopic> ListByResourceGroup (this Microsoft.Azure.Management.EventGrid.ISystemTopicsOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string filter = default, int? top = default);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Rest.Azure.IPage`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Management.EventGrid.Models.SystemTopic> ListByResourceGroup(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.EventGrid.ISystemTopicsOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string filter, valuetype System.Nullable`1<int32> top) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function ListByResourceGroup (operations As ISystemTopicsOperations, resourceGroupName As String, Optional filter As String = Nothing, Optional top As Nullable(Of Integer) = Nothing) As IPage(Of SystemTopic)

static member ListByResourceGroup : Microsoft.Azure.Management.EventGrid.ISystemTopicsOperations * string * string * Nullable<int> -> Microsoft.Rest.Azure.IPage<Microsoft.Azure.Management.EventGrid.Models.SystemTopic>

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The name of the resource group within the user's subscription.

The query used to filter the search results using OData syntax. Filtering is permitted on the 'name' property only and with limited number of OData operations. These operations are: the 'contains' function as well as the following logical operations: not, and, or, eq (for equal), and ne (for not equal). No arithmetic operations are supported. The following is a valid filter example: $filter=contains(namE, 'PATTERN') and name ne 'PATTERN-1'. The following is not a valid filter example: $filter=location eq 'westus'.
The number of results to return per page for the list operation. Valid range for top parameter is 1 to 100. If not specified, the default number of results to be returned is 20 items per page.
Docs.summary: List system topics under a resource group.
Docs.remarks: List all the system topics under a resource group.
